name: Hobo Junk
description:
Use your left and right arrows to avoid the hobo junk.

How many pieces of junk can you avoid?

This was a fun little casual game made while doing the Unity Learn Junior Programmer pathway.  Follow my study progress in my vlogs here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLGN2fGsBquBH0_7t3INdwqul0y8BsW7FU and on my personal blog http://www.digitalkris.au

Enjoy the game!
